moveFile

public void moveFile(java.lang.String ownerPeer,
                     java.lang.String filename,
                     int newLevelNumber)
A file was moved, not necessarily to another sharing level, hence, we must check for it

Parameters:
ownerPeer - is the peer who moved his own file
filename - is the name of the file
newLevelNumber - is the target level. Maybe the same as before

removeFile

public void removeFile(java.lang.String ownerPeer,
                       java.lang.String filename)
A file, previously being shared, was removed.

Parameters:
ownerPeer - is the onwer of the file, the one who removed it
filename - is the name of the file

addFile

public void addFile(java.lang.String ownerPeer,
                    java.lang.String filename,
                    int levelNumber)
A new file was added by a peer at a given sharing level

Parameters:
filename - is the name of the file
levelNumber - is the initial sharing level of the file

readFile

public void readFile(java.lang.String ownerPeer,
                     java.lang.String filename,
                     java.lang.String actor)
A file, owned by onwerPeer was read by some actor

Parameters:
ownerPeer - is the owner of the file
filename - is the name of the file
actor - is the peer who read the file

writeFile

A file, owned by onwerPeer was written by some actor

Parameters:
ownerPeer - is the owner of the file
filename - is the name of the file
actor - is the peer who read the file
